thread.title: Trump Says That He Can “Feel” Obama Secretly Likes Him
thread.title_full: Trump Says That He Can “Feel” Obama Secretly Likes Him

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Trump Says That He Can “Feel” Obama Secretly Likes Him
text:
Trump Says That He Can “Feel” Obama Secretly Likes Him 0 shares 09:34pm February 7, 2017   
Donald Trump said something on Bill O’Reilly last night that is getting some serious attention from the media. 
What else is new? 
I think you’ll enjoy this one though. 
Trump told Bill that he thinks Obama secretly likes him. 
From BizPac Review : 
That’s according to Trump himself, who told host Bill O’Reilly on “The O’Reilly Factor” Monday night that he can “feel” that Obama likes him. 
“It’s a very strange phenomenon. We get along. I don’t know if he’ll admit this, but he likes me,” Trump said. “I like him. I can feel it, you know that’s what I do in life, it’s called, like, I understand. Now, we had a rough campaign, he was fighting better for Hillary than she did. He was vicious during the campaign toward me and I was vicious toward him. We said horrible things about each other” 
Love it. 
The funny thing is…I kind of agree with Trump on this one. 
I can see Obama secretly respecting Trump. 
It is a well-known fact that the Obamas and Clintons aren’t very close and the Clintons are apparently still angry at Obama for not doing more to help her win. 
Publicly, Obama has to act offended by Trump. However, if there’s one thing Obama loves and admires it’s fame. Why else do you think he’s always hob-knobbing with celebrities and hanging out on reality TV shows? 
He loves the spotlight and there’s no bigger spotlight than the one Donald Trump sits in. 
Trump could be way off here but for some reason, this makes sense to me. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
